recipe.title: Waikaloa Breeze
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups passion-orange-guava or other tropical fruit juice
1/2 cup canned cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez)
instructions: Purée first 6 ingredients in blender. Pour into glasses. Garnish with berries.
